name: Hotel Bete Noire
description:
Explore a haunted hotel ,alone in the dark. Armed with nothing but your flashlight, a camera, and problem-solving; you must banish the hotel's malevolent spirits. You must solve the mystery of their deaths. Or die trying.

Development Team

Andrew Bond: Lead Programmer

Miranda Holland: Lead Artist

Daniel Howe: Lead Game Designer/Audio Designer

Sean Randall: Creative Director/2D Artist

James Countryman: 3D Artist

Marisa "M" Donahue: Set Designer

Andrew Ehrlish Producer/Programmer

Gideon Shbeeb - Sponsor

Game Controls

Keyboard/Mouse

Movement: W A S D
First Person camera: Mouse
Sprint: Shift
Jump: Space
Interact: E
Flashlight on/off: Z
Inventory: Tab
Camera up/down: Q
Charge camera flash: hold down left mouse button
Pause: ESC or P

Gamepad

Movement: Left joy stick
First Person camera: Right joy stick
Sprint: Left trigger
Jump: X
Interact: A
Flashlight on/off: Right D-pad
Inventory: Y
Camera up/down: B
Charge camera flash: Right trigger
Pause: Start Button

PC Requirements

Target PC Specifications:

OS: Windows 7+, Mac OS X 10.7+
CPU: Intel Core i5 520M @ 2.40 GHz
Graphics Card: DX9 (Shader model 2.0) capable. NVIDIA 400 GTX or AMD Radeon 5000 HD series or greater
RAM: 2GB or greater

Recommended PC Specifications:

OS: Windows 7 64-bit, Mac OS X 10.9
CPU: Quad-Core Intel or AMD @ 2.50GHz or greater
Graphics Card: NVIDIA 580 GTX or AMD Radeon 6000 HD series or greater
RAM: 4GB or greater
